ticket.title: [Patch] Fix AR detection of postgres interval types with precision
ticket.original-body: AR fails to detect interval types with precision, which look like 'interval(0)'. These types become improperly handled as integers. I modified the type regex to catch the possible trailing '(n)' syntax returned by postgres. Rather than include a separate test, I simply modified the postgres schema to use interval with precision, and all tests pass.
